name: Crypto Inu
description: Crypto Inu is a peer-to-peer cryptocurrency with built-in Automated Rewards Farming technology. Crypto Inu is a multiplayer blockchain real-estate game where the player’s goal is to accumulate wealth and avoid financial insolvency through real-estate and asset investments. The players must invest in the $ABCD token in order to participate in a game. The game play is similar to the traditional game “Monopoly” but has been introduced a social aspect to the game and the use of NFTs to tokenize the characters and properties.
